languages.text: "Воистину. Именно это я и сделала. И продолжу делать. Тени сомнений больше не поглотят мой разум".

traits.locale_text: "Воистину. Именно это я и сделала. И продолжу делать. Тени сомнений больше не поглотят мой разум".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Indeed. That is what I did. And that is what I will continue to do. I won't let the shadows of doubts cloud my mind again."
languages.original_text: "Воистину. Именно это я и сделала. И продолжу делать. Тени сомнений больше не поглотят мой разум".

traits.locale_text: "Indeed. That is what I did. And that is what I will continue to do. I won't let shadows of doubts cloud my mind again."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Indeed. That is what I did. And that is what I will continue to do. I won't let shadows of doubts cloud my mind again."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Indeed. That is what I did. And that is what I will continue to do. I won't let the shadows of doubts cloud my mind again."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Indeed. That is what I did. And that is what I will continue to do. I won't let the shadows of doubts cloud my mind again."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Indeed. That is what I did. And that is what I will continue to do. I won't let the shadows of doubts cloud my mind again."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「まさに。これが我のしたことだ。そして今後も続けていく。我は疑いの陰に精神を曇らせるなんてことはしません」
languages.original_text: "Indeed. That is what I did. And that is what I will continue to do. I won't let the shadows of doubts cloud my mind again."

traits.locale_text: 「まさに。これが我のしたことだ。そして今後も続けていく。我は疑いの陰に精神を曇らせるなんてことはしません」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “没错，我就是这么做的，而且我会继续这么做下去，我绝不会再让怀疑的阴影笼罩我的心灵。”
languages.original_text: "Indeed. That is what I did. And that is what I will continue to do. I won't let the shadows of doubts cloud my mind again."

traits.locale_text: “没错，我就是这么做的，而且我会继续这么做下去，我绝不会再让怀疑的阴影笼罩我的心灵。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « En effet. C'est ce que je fais depuis toujours et je ne compte pas m'arrêter en si bon chemin. Plus jamais les ombres du doute ne m'embrouilleront l'esprit. »
languages.original_text: "Indeed. That is what I did. And that is what I will continue to do. I won't let the shadows of doubts cloud my mind again."

traits.locale_text: « En effet. C'est ce que je fais depuis toujours et je ne compte pas m'arrêter en si bon chemin. Plus jamais les ombres du doute ne m'embrouilleront l'esprit. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Efectivamente. Eso he hecho y eso seguiré haciendo. No dejaré que la sombra de la duda vuelva a nublar mi mente».
languages.original_text: "Indeed. That is what I did. And that is what I will continue to do. I won't let the shadows of doubts cloud my mind again."

traits.locale_text: «Efectivamente. Eso he hecho y eso seguiré haciendo. No dejaré que la sombra de la duda vuelva a nublar mi mente».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "In der Tat. Das habe ich getan. Und das werde ich auch weiterhin tun. Ich lasse mir nicht mehr von Schatten des Zweifels den Geist vernebeln."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. That is what I did. And that is what I will continue to do. I won't let the shadows of doubts cloud my mind again."

traits.locale_text: "In der Tat. Das habe ich getan. Und das werde ich auch weiterhin tun. Ich lasse mir nicht mehr von Schatten des Zweifels den Geist vernebeln."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Aynen öyle. Tam olarak onu yaptım... Yapmaya da devam edeceğim. Şüphe bulutlarının, aklıma bir daha gölge düşürmesine izin vermeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. That is what I did. And that is what I will continue to do. I won't let the shadows of doubts cloud my mind again."

traits.locale_text: "Aynen öyle. Tam olarak onu yaptım... Yapmaya da devam edeceğim. Şüphe bulutlarının, aklımı bir kez daha gölgelemesine izin vermeyeceğim."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
